Contact matrices as calculated by Prem. et al.

Source: R/data_prem_contact_matrices.R
prem_germany_contact_matrices.Rd

Contact matrices as calculated by Prem. et al. (2021) PLoS Computational Biology. Updated to use the latest corrected matrices from their 2021 publication. DOI: 10.1371/journal.pcbi.1009098

Usage

prem_germany_contact_matrices

Format

A list with 5 elements:

home

A 16x16 matrix containing the number of home contacts, by 5 year age group

work

A 16x16 matrix containing the number of workplace contacts, by 5 year age group

school

A 16x16 matrix containing the number of school contacts, by 5 year age group

other

A 16x16 matrix containing the number of other contacts, by 5 year age group

all

A 16x16 matrix containing the number of all contacts, by 5 year age group

All age groups are 5 year age bands, from 0 to 80.

Source

https://journals.plos.org/ploscompbiol/article?id=10.1371/journal.pcbi.1009098

https://github.com/kieshaprem/synthetic-contact-matrices

On this page
